RESTORECARD_DESCRIPTION: Restore a burnt card within 3 days of burning it
ENTER_CODE: Enter a code to restore. Usage: `{{prefix}}restore <code>`
CARD_NOT_FOUND: The card with code `{{code}}` was not found in your burned cards.
CARD_EXPIRED: The card with code `{{code}}` has expired and can no longer be restored.
RESTORE_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to restore the card `{{code}}` for {{amount}} {{currency}}?
MISSING_CURRENCY: You need {{amount}} {{currency}} to restore a card.
RESTORE_SUCCESSFUL: The card with code `{{code}}` has been restored.
RESTORE_FAILED: The card with code `{{code}}` could not be restored.
